title: a298b112
author: a298b112
content: I had some ETH on my Ledger account during the merge. Is there anyway I can receive the same amount of ETHW? How do I do that? Anyone received actually?

comments.author: xandry
comments.body: They (Ledger) have official tutorial:This tutorial describes how to access your Ledger Ethereum POW (ETHW) via MetaMask.
